identification.author: Cis Cobol Conversion By V B Coen FBCS, FIDM, FIDPM, 18/10/83

validations.errorHandling:
perform  OTM3-Open-Input
              if       fs-reply not = zero
                       perform OTM3-Close
                       go to Main-Exit
              end-if
     end-if
     perform  Sales-Open-Input

if oi-type = 5
              add oi-paid       to t-pay
              add oi-approp     to t-approp
              add oi-deduct-amt to t-deducts

move oi-paid  to  l6-i-approp
     end-if
     add      oi-net oi-extra oi-vat oi-discount oi-carriag
